programme.desc: Audrey and Morgan are best friends who unwittingly become entangled in an international conspiracy when one of the women discovers the boyfriend who dumped her was actually a spy.(n)

programme.title: Roboshark
programme.desc: A great white bites a UFO aircraft in the Pacific and turns into a robo/shark hybrid.(n)

programme.title: He's Out There
programme.desc: On vacation at a remote lake house, a mother and her two young daughters must fight for survival after falling into a terrifying and bizarre nightmare conceived by a psychopath.(n)

programme.title: Drone Wars
programme.desc: Filled with smoke and fire, the sky is littered with ships hovering above for miles in every direction. These ships reap the Earth of all its resources, while drones patrol the now ruined cities.(n)

programme.title: I Will Take Your Dead
programme.desc: William has a simple job to make dead bodies disappear. One day, William realizes that a woman dumped at the house is not actually dead.(n)

programme.title: Hard Night Falling
programme.desc: After an Interpol operation in Italy, Michael attends a company dinner party when suddenly, the 50 guests are held hostage by 15-20 armed men for $150,000,000 there.(n)

programme.title: Aladdin And The Death Lamp
programme.desc: Aladdin and his friend Ali accidentally uncover a lamp that contains a genie - but instead of granting wishes...this genie has other plans.(n)

programme.title: V.F.W
programme.desc: A group of war veterans must defend their local VFW post and an innocent teen against a deranged drug dealer and his relentless army of punk mutants.(n)

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: After getting in a car accident, a woman is held in a shelter with two men, who claim the outside world is affected by a widespread chemical attack.(n)

programme.title: The Haunted House On Kirby Road
programme.desc: A group of 20-somethings set out to discover if an urban myth of a haunted house holds any truth.(n)

programme.title: Battle Drone
programme.desc: A group of skilled mercenaries find themselves betrayed by the US government and are forced to fight their way out of an ambush by a new, and lethal team of human droids.(n)

programme.title: Addams Family Values
programme.desc: It's love at first fright when Gomez (Raul Julia) and Morticia (Anjelica Huston) welcome a new addition to the Addams household -- Pubert, their soft, cuddly, mustachioed baby boy.(n)

programme.title: The Untouchables
programme.desc: This classic confrontation between good and evil and stars Kevin Costner as federal agent Ness, Robert De Niro as gangland kingpin Al Capone & Sean Connery as Malone who teaches Ness how to beat the mob.(n)

programme.title: The Black Stallion
programme.desc: Teri Garr and Mickey Rooney star in this heartwarming adventure about a boy who forges a special friendship with a wild stallion after both are shipwrecked on a deserted island.(n)

programme.title: Patton
programme.desc: The career of World War II Gen. George S. Patton is traced through the North African, Sicilian and European campaigns, as well as his conflicts with other officers. Based on factual material from "Patton: Ordeal & Triumph" by Ladislas Farago and "A Soldier's Story" by Omar N. Bradley.(n)

programme.title: White Men Can't Jump
programme.desc: A midwestern white kid, Billy teams up with a hardened ghetto ball player, Sydney to rule the betting circuit on the venice basketball courts. They're the best basketball hustlers in town.(n)

programme.title: 48 Hrs.
programme.desc: A weary cop springs a con out of jail for two days in order to track down a criminal.(n)

programme.desc: Saigon, 1965. An airman disc-jockey Adrian Cronauer arrives in sweltering Southeast Asia to take up his post as morning D.J. on the local Armed Forces Radio network.(n)

programme.title: Another 48 Hrs.

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: Based on a Stephen King novel, Carrie is the story of a girl brought up, almost in isolation, by her psychotically religious mother Margaret. After an embarrassing incident causes her fellow pupils to tease Carrie ruthlessly, her teacher disciplines the students severely. Determined to seek revenge, the students hatch a plot against Carrie, which turns horribly wrong when Carrie's strange mental powers are unleashed during the school prom.(n)

programme.title: The Waterboy
programme.desc: Bobby Boucher, a 31-year-old from the swamps of Louisiana, is home schooled by his mama. His only contact with society is his waterboy job for a college team where the players relentlessly make fun of him.(n)

programme.title: Young Guns
programme.desc: A group of young gunmen, led by Billy the Kid, become deputies to avenge the murder of the rancher who became their benefactor. But when Billy takes their authority too far, they become the hunted.(n)

programme.title: Dogs Are Incredible
programme.desc: Korea's "Comedy King" Lee Gyenggyu who's also known for his love for dogs, along with the country's most famous dog expert Kang Hyungwook, team up to study how humans and pets live in peace and harmony.(n)

programme.title: Something In Blue
programme.desc: Four young people, one city. For love or ideals, with funny and faint bewilderment. An original improvisation in Chinese cinema, a brand-new rendering of city life.(n)

programme.title: Saving Mr. Wu
programme.desc: An action-packed crime thriller based on the true story of China's famous celebrity kidnapping case. Mr. Wu is kidnapped in Beijing by Zhang Hua and three accomplices, all disguised as cops. In the ensuing 20 hours, Chinese detectives led by Chief Xing quickly form a task force to sweep the city.(n)

programme.title: One Night Only
programme.desc: Having lost all his fortune and loved ones from gambling, Gao Ye walks out from prison to an even crueler world. Intrigued by a beautiful hooker who approaches him for unknown reason, he comes up a master plan to redeem everything he once had, but things spin wildly out of control.(n)

programme.title: Drink Drank Drunk
programme.desc: Alan is a rich kid looking forward to a busy 24 hours: his birthday celebration tonight and attending court as witness in a criminal trial the next morning. Alan's lawyer knows his client's unreliability, so he pressures Alan's dependable chum Chris to tag along.(n)

programme.title: The Princess And The Matchmaker
programme.desc: Princess Songhwa refuses her fate to marry one of four suitors. Seo Do-yoon, skilled at interpreting marital harmony signs, is selected as the person to ascertain her best match.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Chef
programme.desc: Chi Ming runs off with his daughter after losing a custody battle with his late wife's father. Through a series of happenstances, they end up at the home of Chi Bao and her grandmother, who hail from a clan renowned for cooking.(n)

programme.title: Dearest Anita
programme.desc: Edith returns the abandoned items from Anita Mui's house to its original senders after the death of the famous Cantopop diva in 2003. The film revives five close fans' collective image and memory of Mui.(n)

programme.title: Keep Calm And Be A Superstar
programme.desc: Zhu, from China, is a huge fan of Hong Kong cinema and has always dreamed of becoming a cop like in the movies. Unfortunately, he fails the fitness exam in China's Police Force selection because of asthma.(n)

programme.title: Mon Mon Mon Monsters
programme.desc: Lin Shu-wei is assigned to do community service alongside some bullies. As the gang of bullies progressively accept him as one of their own, Lin partakes in their misdeeds. During a night out, the group stumble upon a pair of flesh-eating female ghouls and capture one of them.(n)

programme.title: Sakura Guardian In The North
programme.desc: Tetsu Ezure escapes with her son from Sakhalin Island after the Soviet Union invades the area as she struggles to survive as a refugee in Abashiri City's extreme cold weather and famine.(n)

programme.title: Night And Fog
programme.desc: The story starts from the end, with a man brutally murdering his wife and daughters. Director Ann Hui gradually unmasks the idyll of the peaceful family and that of Hong Kong as the promised land for gold seekers.(n)

programme.title: All Because Of Love
programme.desc: Erkan, a frequent victim of bullies in high school, wants to reveal his affection for the beautiful Man-li. When Erkan confesses his love for Man-li, her current boyfriend Andy gives Erkan a good beating!(n)

programme.title: Tokyo Raiders
programme.desc: On the wedding day of Macy, her bridegroom Takahashi does not show up. Macy goes to Tokyo to look for him. She meets Tommy, an interior designer who wants to collect debt from Takahashi, and Lenny, a private eye who is hired by a gangster boss to spy on Takahashi.(n)

programme.title: Doraemon: Nobita And The Birth Of Japan (Jap)
programme.desc: Nobita, Doraemon and friends travel back 70,000 years in time in the 36th Doraemon adventure film! To escape the pressures of school and family, Nobita and his friends decide to run away from home.(n)

programme.title: Shed Skin Papa
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck man is tasked with taking care of his elderly father, only to discover that the man is shedding a layer of skin every day, making him younger in the process.(n)

programme.title: Shinjuku Incident
programme.desc: Tractor repairman Steelhead sneaks into Japan illegally to look for his girlfriend Xiu Xiu. He joins old friend Jie and a band of Chinese illegal immigrants living in the shadowy fringes of Japanese society. Steelhead rises to become the new leader of Shinjuku with the help of a yakuza boss.(n)

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: The story follows Chen Mo, a bar owner and 'ferryman' as he is slowly facing his own traumatic past whilst helping the people around him, including his co-partner Guan Chun, singer Ma Li and neighbour Xiao Yu.(n)

programme.title: Wayang Boy
programme.desc: The film follows 10-year-old Raja, an Indian boy who's recently been brought to Singapore by his stepmother Emma. After Raja gets into a scuffle with his new classmates Xavier and Shi Han, all three boys end up in detention.(n)

programme.title: A Day
programme.desc: A mystery drama revolving around a father who commits an unethical act to save his daughter's life. Three years later, his actions return to haunt him, trapping him in an endless time loop.(n)

programme.title: Shadow
programme.desc: In Pei, a kingdom ruled by an unpredictable king, the military commander faces peril both inside and outside the palace walls. But he has a secret weapon: a "shadow", a look-alike who can fool both Pei's enemies and the King himself.(n)

programme.title: Monstrum
programme.desc: Yoon Gyeom is a loyal subject of King Jung Jong of Joseon. He struggles to fight against a monster that threatens King Jung Jong's life and a group of people trying to depose King Jung Jong.(n)

programme.title: Port Of Call
programme.desc: Jiamei Wang moved to Hong Kong two years ago. Desperate to become financially independent from her mother and stepfather, she ends up becoming a "compensated date". Chi-chung Ting, a truck driver, finds Jiamei online. They communicate via text message and become friends right away.(n)

programme.title: The Golden Era
programme.desc: This film tells the life story of Xiao Hong, one of China's most famous essayists and novelists, who reflected progressive thinking not frequently seen during the 1930s.(n)

programme.title: Moonlight In Tokyo
programme.desc: Wang Hoi finds himself in big trouble with the local Tokyo Yakuza bosses when a business deal goes wrong. Fortunately, he bumps into Jun.(n)

programme.title: Eye In The Sky
programme.desc: The surveillance team of the Crime Intelligence Unit comprises officers who are unremarkable in appearance. In the streets, they would pass you by unnoticed and unseen. They will not leave a mark.(n)

programme.title: Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: San and Yo work as bodyguards-for-hire in Hong Kong, but business isn't exactly booming for these bumbling buddies. The two head to South Korea for a mysterious job to protect a reporter, but a hotel bombing leaves the client dead and sends them on the run as suspects.(n)

programme.title: The Conmen In Vegas
programme.desc: Master gambler King and his sidekick Dragon have gotten a new partner in the latter's swindler cousin Nat. Together, the trio successfully con a huge fortune from the underground casino owned by Brother Man. The vicious gang boss sends his henchmen after them, and Dragon is taken.(n)

programme.title: The Miracles Of The Namiya General Store
programme.desc: In 2012, Atsuya and his two childhood friends run into an old general store. They decide to stay there until the morning. Late into the night, Atsuya sees a letter in the mailbox.(n)

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: While two criminals hide out at a woman's apartment after a botched robbery, an ex-cop tries to find a missing gun.(n)

programme.title: Go Lala Go 2
programme.desc: A new cast breathes new life into the oft-adapted story of a modern woman who must learn to balance work, life and love. Lala starts a new career after a company restructures. She encounters a handsome and successful client, Chen Feng, who proposes to Lala.(n)

programme.title: Brotherhood Of Blades 2
programme.desc: In the Ming dynasty of China, Shen Lian, a secret police of corrupt government, is trapped by the conspiracy on a mission. To prove his innocence, he seeks the truth with a girl called Bei Zhai.(n)

programme.title: Royal Tramp
programme.desc: After saving Chan, the leader of the Heaven and Earth society, Wai Siu Bo, a lecherous wimp, is made a member. Following a botched first assignment for the group, he is made a servant to the Emperor, the very person the Heaven and Earth society wants to overthrow.(n)

programme.title: Get Outta Here
programme.desc: Lucky for everyone involved, Joe doesn't like to drink human blood, and he forms a bond with his new flat mates. However, other vampires do lurk in Hong Kong, and they soon side with the greedy land developers angling for Apple's flat.(n)

programme.title: More Than Blue
programme.desc: Sharing similar circumstances, K and Cream become best friends and share a home. Diagnosed with terminal illness, K never confesses his love for Cream. He wants her to settle down before his time runs out.(n)

programme.title: The God Of Cookery
programme.desc: This uproarious comedy centres on Sik San, the self-proclaimed God of Cookery. He hits the skids when his cooking empire is usurped by a mean-spirited rival. He is saved by the true love and good cooking of Sister Turkey, a plain but pure-hearted street vendor whose wares heal the sick.(n)

programme.title: Missing ()
programme.desc: In 2005, a high-profile case of a police officer who disappeared during a forest hike spawned urban legends about the existence of a gateway into another world. Those legends are now adapted into an eerie supernatural thriller.(n)

programme.title: Siew Lup
programme.desc: Mia, a former prostitute, becomes the wife of Quan, a roast meat shop owner. Suffering from physical violence by Quan, Mia meets Wu. A sinister plot begins when Wu and Mia fall in love.(n)

programme.title: Look For A Star
programme.desc: Inspired by the relationship between Stanly Ho and his fourth wife Angela, this is a romantic comedy about a billonaire who falls in love with a feisty casino dealer.(n)

programme.title: Ice Kacang Puppy Love
programme.desc: Set in a unique small town of 1980s Malaysia, this story revolves around a nice but shy boy, Botak, and a brave and adventurous girl, Da Jia Yu.(n)

programme.title: If You Are The One 2
programme.desc: Wealthy middle-aged entrepreneur Qin and beautiful flight attendant Xiaoxiao Liang question their relationship after presiding over good friends Mang Guo and Shan Li's lavish "divorce ceremony".(n)

programme.title: Napping Princess
programme.desc: In the near future, a high-school senior discovers that events in her waking life begin to parallel events in her dreams.(n)

programme.title: My Egg Boy
programme.desc: A woman freezes her eggs and looks for the right man to start a family. In the pursuit of this man, she ends up in a wintry Swedish Province, where ice and snow become a metaphor for the unborn child who is waiting to be born.(n)

programme.title: The Leakers
programme.desc: After a mutated Zika epidemic breaks out in Malaysia, an illegal hacker group, The Leakers, tries to disclose pharmaceutical company AMANAH Malaysia's conspiracy and crimes.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Wife
programme.desc: High schooler Nard is in a relationship with Mac. When Nard gets pregnant, her mother persuades her to abort the baby. However, Nard dies during the abortion, haunting the apartment complex.(n)

programme.title: All My Goddess
programme.desc: Four ladies, Eileen, Zhou Li Jun, Chen Ruo Yan and Zhang Jia Xin were colleagues as stewardesses 10 years ago. They are reunited at Jia Xin's wedding and gather in a resort in Penang. The friends are introduced to the bridegroom Gary, a Prince Charming look-alike.(n)

programme.title: Spl2 A Time For Consequences
programme.desc: Undercover cop Kit becomes a junkie in order to catch Mr Hung. When the operation goes sour and Kit blows his cover, his supervisor and uncle, Wah, decides to terminate the operation. When Kit disappears without a trace, Wah tracks Kit to a prison in Thailand.(n)

programme.title: Tomorrow Is Another Day
programme.desc: Wong Kam Fa is a middle-aged housewife whose life revolves around her 20-year-old autistic son. After learning that her husband is having an affair, she plots to take revenge on the mistress.(n)

programme.title: The Wasted Times
programme.desc: Over the course of several decades, a deal between the Japanese army and criminals in Shanghai plays out with violence and betrayal.(n)

programme.title: Murderer
programme.desc: Ling is a self-assured Police Chief Inspector who is investigating a cold-blooded serial murder case. However, due to the homicide attempt of a fellow inspector named Tai in which Ling emerged unscathed, colleagues are fast becoming aware of Ling's potential involvement.(n)

programme.title: Viral
programme.desc: A girl ends up at an abandoned building while playing an augmented reality game. She wins the game and takes a photo to commemorate her win. Later, she realises there is a mysterious girl in the photo she has taken. Worse, the mystery girl is now haunting her.(n)

programme.title: My Left Eye Sees Ghost
programme.desc: One night, May Ho suffers a car accident while driving drunk. A naughty ghost named Ken comes to save May's life and a strange thing happens - May's left eye has the ability to see ghosts!(n)

programme.title: Assembly
programme.desc: A soldier fights to gain recognition for comrades who died during the Chinese Civil War.(n)

programme.title: Fight Back To School 2
programme.desc: Despite being demoted, devoted cop Sing longs to win back the respect of his peers. When Sing is reassigned to an exclusive international school and uncovers a lucrative arms smuggling ring, he may have finally stumbled upon the case that will get him back on the beat.(n)

programme.title: Murmur Of The Hearts
programme.desc: Nan and Mei are brother and sister growing up on the beautiful Green Island, off the shore of the port city of Taitung in Taiwan. But soon their parents separate. Four-year-old Mei goes to Taipei with her mother, while seven-year-old Nan stays on Green Island with his father.(n)

programme.title: Distance
programme.desc: Businessman Chen travels to Guangxi for work. During a site visit, he catches sight of his estranged father. The father he resents is now a crippled old man who doesn't recognise him.(n)

programme.title: The Rope Curse
programme.desc: Hoping to make a viral video by streaming a mysterious rope ritual, a couple falls into a deadly curse instead that turns their lives upside down.(n)

programme.title: The Kid From The Big Apple
programme.desc: As Sarah's mother has to relocate to China on a work assignment, she has to turn to her estranged father back in Malaysia. To a 12-year-old contemporary youngster like Sarah, Malaysia seems like her worst nightmare come true.(n)

programme.title: The Farewell Girls
programme.desc: Three girls have been chasing their music dreams, but they keep failing until they met the owner of a funeral service company. They perform with a pair of funeral singers, but they do not get along well.(n)

programme.title: Suddenly Twenty
programme.desc: Parn is a stubborn old woman in her 70s whose only pleasure in life is to brag about her son who she single-handedly raised to be a professor. One day, she learns that her son is planning to send her off to a nursing home.(n)

programme.title: Call Of Heroes
programme.desc: During the warlords era in China, a village located in rural area called Pucheng falls into danger when the cruel commandant Cao from the enemy troops arrives and kills the innocent. The guardians of Pucheng are desperate to fight against Cao and protect their homeland.(n)

programme.title: Never Say Die
programme.desc: A male boxer switches bodies with the female reporter who exposed his bribes. Now they must help each other win the championship.(n)

programme.title: Legend Of The Demon Cat
programme.desc: In the Tang Dynasty, a demon cat appears and breaks the peace of Chang'an City, causing a series of strange events. Poet Bai Letian and Monk Kukai join hands to investigate the death of Concubine Yang.(n)

programme.title: Bakuman
programme.desc: Mashiro Moritaka has a knack for drawing. When classmate and aspiring writer Takagi Akito discovers Moritaka's drawing skills, he suggests they join forces to create a manga. Moritaka isn't so hot on the idea - that is, until a girl enters the picture to provide some extra motivation.(n)

programme.title: The Tag Along
programme.desc: After a funeral, a family is watching a trip video in which a weird-looking little girl in red is found tagging along the relative who passed away. But no one remembers seeing her anywhere during the trip.(n)

programme.title: House Of Fury
programme.desc: Teddy Yu appears to be just a Chinese chiropractor and widowed father. His son Nicky and daughter Natalie learn kung-fu from him, but the two kids are always skeptical of Teddy's claim of having a hidden life as a guardian for secret agents in the past. One day, Teddy gets kidnapped.(n)

programme.title: The Banquet
programme.desc: A loose adaptation of Hamlet, which is set in an empire in chaos. The Emperor, the Empress, the Crown Prince, the Minister and the General all have their own enemies they would like to finish off at a night banquet.(n)

programme.title: Marry A Rich Man

programme.title: My Best Summer

programme.title: Mrs K
programme.desc: Mrs K is a story of a woman who gives everything that she has to protect her husband and daughter when enemies from her past come hunting her.(n)

programme.title: Wu Yen
programme.desc: Emperor Qi, the male ruler of an ancient kingdom overrun by warring tribes, is set to marry the warrior-heroine Wu Yen when a mischievous, bisexual sorceress known as Yin Chun falls in love with both of them and begins meddling in their affairs.(n)

programme.title: Bad Genius

programme.title: The Cases II

programme.title: Godspeed
programme.desc: A Taiwanese drug mule has his foolproof smuggling method thrown out of whack when he catches a ride with the wrong cab driver, in this highly-entertaining caper starring Hong Kong comedy legend Michael Hui.(n)

programme.title: Goodbye Mr. Loser
programme.desc: At the wedding of his former high-school crush Qiu Ya, unemployed musician Xia Luo is bitter about how successful his classmates have become and all that never was for him. The drunk Xia Luo hides in the bathroom and passes out. When he wakes up, he finds himself back in 1997 as a teenager.(n)

programme.title: Inspector Pink Dragon
programme.desc: Nerdy Inspector Lawrence Cheng becomes the object of a scam involving heartthrob Rosamund Kwan and tycoon gangster Damian Lau.(n)

programme.title: Trouble Couples
programme.desc: Family tradition dictates that spinsterish Anita Mui marry before her younger sisters, so they try to fix her up with Eric Tsang.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Fever
programme.desc: A married businessman's ill-advised dalliance with a mysterious beauty comes back to haunt him - literally - when it turns out his bedmate is one of a family of ghosts.(n)

programme.title: Millionaires Express
programme.desc: The No. 1 comedy hit of 1986 has kung-fu master Sammo Hung involved with officials, concubines, merchants and conmen in old China.(n)

programme.title: Rouge
programme.desc: The ghost of a courtesan who died in 1934 returns to Hong Kong 53 years later, seeking to reunite with the man she loved.(n)

programme.title: Flaming Brothers
programme.desc: Alan and Tien have formed a bond since childhood that will last a lifetime. Later, they progress from pickpockets to gangsters running a successful nightclub business, but their refusal to get involved in drug trafficking incurrs the wrath of local crime boss Kao.(n)

programme.title: Devoted To You
programme.desc: A coming-of-age drama about the psychological changes of May Lo and Loletta Lee when they encounter Jacky Cheung and Michael Wong.(n)

programme.title: City Squeeze
programme.desc: Wong is a supervisor at Yau's firm, and is often taken advantage of because of his integrity and timidity. One day, Yau is stunned by a receptionist, Fung. Most of the male staff in the firm are also interested in Fung, including Wong. But Wong doesn't have the courage to approach her.(n)

programme.title: Carry On Pickpocket
programme.desc: Pickpocket Sammo Hung falls for policewoman Deanie Yip and is convinced to steal for her. But Deanie is not what she seems to be.(n)

programme.title: Sunshine Friends
programme.desc: In order to save her father's television station, Elizabeth asks four funny witty guys for help, but the situation gets worse under their guide.(n)

programme.desc: Police inspector and excellent hostage negotiator Ho Sheung-Sang finds himself in over his head when he is pulled into a 72-hour game by a cancer-suffering criminal out for vengeance on Hong Kong's organised crime syndicates.(n)

programme.title: Vampire Vs. Vampire

programme.title: Black Cat
programme.desc: Jade Leung is explosive as the Hong Kong equivalent of La Femme Nikita, a sleek killing machine who yearns to start a new life.(n)

programme.title: Happy Ghost III
programme.desc: The spirit of late female singer Tsui Pan Han waits in the afterlife to be reincarnated. She meets the Godfather who has found an appropriate family for her to be reincarnated with. Her opportunity to be born into the family is ruined when Sam Kwai takes his pregnant wife to the wrong hospital.(n)

programme.title: Those Merry Souls
programme.desc: This supernatural kung-fu comedy stars Yuen Biao as a stuntman who reluctantly takes up the family profession: a collector of dead souls.(n)

programme.title: Farewell China

programme.desc: Brandon Ma is a regular working Joe who holds down two jobs to support his girlfriend May and his dream of owning a motorcycle. Brandon's best friend is Michael, an ambitious dope peddler. Michael covets May and comes up with a plan to win her over.(n)

programme.title: Lucky Stars Go Places
programme.desc: The lucky stars reunite again. This time, their mission is to investigate a case of international ammunition trade that involves two gangs.(n)

programme.title: Dreadnaught
programme.desc: A violent criminal named White Tiger is on the run from the police and joins a theatre troupe to hide out, killing anyone who suspects his identity. One person he unsuccessfully tries to kill several times is a cowardly laundry man named Mousy.(n)

programme.title: The Sword
programme.desc: The Sword is a 1980 Wuxia film starring Adam Cheng and directed by Patrick Tam.(n)

programme.title: 100 Ways To Murder Your Wife
programme.desc: Two men plot to kill their beautiful but nagging and unbearable wives.(n)

programme.title: Wonder Women ()

programme.title: The Good The Bad & The Beauty

programme.desc: Villager Bold Cheung, known for his willingness to do anything courageous or daring, becomes a target by the evil rich Master Tam who wants to keep Cheung's wife as his mistress. Cheung is tricked into a bet to spend the night in a haunted temple.(n)

programme.title: The Private Eyes
programme.desc: A small detective agency has problems staying in business, and out of trouble.(n)

programme.title: Queen's Bench III
programme.desc: Bumbling lawyer Alfred Cheung is assigned to a sensational murder case involving Tony Leung and Carina Lau, with farcical results.(n)

programme.desc: Gambling-obsessed couple Mr and Mrs Luo, after hearing that a rival called Snake's recent run of luck has been due to his taking of "coffin air", decide to follow him one night, ending up in a run-down mortuary.(n)

programme.title: Full Throttle
programme.desc: One of Hong Kong's top motorcycle racers is forced to reevaluate his entire way of life after a serious accident and the loss of a close friend.(n)

programme.title: The Diary Of A Big Man
programme.desc: Chow Ting-Fat loves two women equally and cannot say no to either as both bring the proposal of marriage to him. Number one is Joey Wong, a boutique owner. Number two is Sally Yeh, a stewardess.(n)

programme.title: Warriors Two
programme.desc: Hua stumbles upon a plot hatched by a businessman named Mo to take over the city of Fushan by killing its headman.(n)

programme.title: Police Story

programme.title: Lord Of East China Sea
programme.desc: Ray Lui excels as the King of Gangsters in old Shanghai - scheming, killing and loving his way through the roaring '20s.(n)

programme.title: Chocolate Inspector

programme.desc: Hui, an owner of a Hong Kong tabloid magazine company, hires martial artist Bill Lee (Sam Hui) to help him get a good headliner for a magazine story to hopefully save his failing business.(n)

programme.title: The Inspector Wears Skirts

programme.desc: Gong Wei is a Chinese government special agent who is assigned to work undercover in Hong Kong. To gain trust from the gang leader, Gong Wei has to take part in a shootout, taking Inspector Anita Fong as hostage.(n)

programme.title: The Seventh Curse
programme.desc: Chow Yun-Fat is Wisely, Hong Kong's Indiana Jones, in an adventure involving a Thai curse and a Buddhist gem.(n)

programme.title: THE PERFECT MATCH ()

programme.title: Passion
programme.desc: Sylvia Chang performs in a tragic but romantic love story between two women and a man.(n)

programme.title: Heroes Shed No Tears
programme.desc: John Woo's first action film is a tale of CIA-recruited commandos battling drug lords in the Golden Triangle.(n)

programme.title: BB30

programme.title: The Adventurers ()

programme.title: Why Why Tell Me Why
programme.desc: Anita Mui learns that mahjong and romance don't mix in a comedy where she must curb her mahjong addiction to get Anthony Chan.(n)
